name: ScanCleaner
short_description:
This little Java tool was written for conditioning scans in JPEG format like scanned slides, negatives, prints, etc. Provided operations are

    - load and save JPEG files
    - removal of stains of dirt, fuzz or damages
    - copy & paste of selected areas
    - rotate and flip pictures
    - remove borders

The program was optimized for simple handling with a minimum of mouse and keyboard activities to facilitate fast and comfortable processing of large numbers of scans.

Tested to be free of spyware, adware or viruses by SOFTPEDIA (http://www.softpedia.com/progClean/ScanCleaner-Clean-226994.html)
